disaster-cards.name: Asteroids
disaster-cards.description: Ship Takes 1 dmg each turn. Resolved with Battery placed in Cpt Quarters

disaster-cards.name: Gamma Ray Burst
disaster-cards.story: You wouldn't like me when I'm angry.

disaster-cards.name: Crashed Ship Debris
disaster-cards.story: You should see the other guy
disaster-cards.description: Roll 1d6. 5+ find 2 items, 4- pirates steal 1 item from each player.

disaster-cards.name: Destroyed Planet
disaster-cards.story: You should see the other guy

disaster-cards.name: Heat Zone
disaster-cards.story: You should see the other guy
disaster-cards.description: Roll 1d6 4 times. Room corresponding to the number is Burning (Burns don't stack)

disaster-cards.name: Space Time Distortion
disaster-cards.story: You should see the other guy

disaster-cards.name: Clumsy Footing
disaster-cards.description: You trip and drop 1d4 items of your choosing

disaster-cards.name: Hole in One
disaster-cards.story: There's a hole in my backpack dear Liza
disaster-cards.description: You get a small bag blocker token. Can be repaired with a Repair Kit

disaster-cards.name: Holey Moley!
disaster-cards.description: You got a Big bag blocker token. Can be repaired with a Repair Kit

disaster-cards.name: Intergalactic Storm
disaster-cards.story: You should see the other guy

positive-cards.name: What's this?
positive-cards.description: May choose an item to find and add it to your inventory or drop it

positive-cards.name: Leave an item, take an item
positive-cards.description: All players pick one item and pass it to their left.

ShipLocation-cards.name: Auto Pilot Off
ShipLocation-cards.description: While active, no Jumps can be made. Activate the Cockpit with a 3+ on a 1d6

ShipLocation-cards.name: Bad Medicine
ShipLocation-cards.description: Whoever was last inside MedBay gets infected status (if none, roll)

ShipLocation-cards.name: Faulty Nurse
ShipLocation-cards.description: No healing can be done. Can be fixed using 2 actions

ShipLocation-cards.name: Buggy Equipment
ShipLocation-cards.description: All healing done is halved. Fixed using Wrench

ShipLocation-cards.name: Core Overheat
ShipLocation-cards.story: Core is overheating. If not cooled in 3 jumps will cause 5 damage to ship & those in room

ShipLocation-cards.name: Loose Bolts
ShipLocation-cards.story: Random doors seem to seal/unseal each player's turn
ShipLocation-cards.description: Roll 2d6 to see what doors flip state. Fixed using Wrench & Welder

ShipLocation-cards.name: Ammo Spill
ShipLocation-cards.description: Roll 1d4 to decide what ammo is received. Can be reorganized using a Broom and 2 actions

ShipLocation-cards.name: Bad Locks
ShipLocation-cards.description: can only be fixed using a Crowbar

ShipLocation-cards.name: Grenade!!!
ShipLocation-cards.description: Deal 1d6 damage to all those armory. Also remove all dropped items in Armory. Start Burning?

ShipLocation-cards.name: Power Shortage
ShipLocation-cards.description: All doors become shut. Can leave by using 1 action or expend 1 Crowbar. Power can be turned on by using a Battery

ShipLocation-cards.name: Gravity Lift
ShipLocation-cards.description: Movement now takes 2 actions (unless wearing Mag-Boots). Can be shutoff in Main Room using HackChip

ShipLocation-cards.name: Loose Parasite
ShipLocation-cards.story: Player who drew card has encounterd a infectious virus
ShipLocation-cards.description: Player gets Infected. They pass it anyone they share a room with (even while moving). Can be cured using Antidote or Laboratory action. Players who recieve the virus cannot pass it.

ShipLocation-cards.name: Chemical Explosion
ShipLocation-cards.description: causes 1d4 damage and Burn to all players in Lab. All dropped items are destroyed and room is Burning. Need FireExtinguisher to put out fire.

Enemy-cards.name: Stunning Robot
Enemy-cards.description: Moves to Closest Unstunned player. 4+ on d6, player is stunned

Enemy-cards.name: Z-nomorph
Enemy-cards.description: d6 to players. Weak to fire (ignores armor)

Enemy-cards.name: Vacu-Bot
Enemy-cards.description: Moves to new room (clockwise) and destroys all dropped items in it

Enemy-cards.name: Looter
Enemy-cards.description: moves to player with most items and deals 1d4 damage. When defeated drops 3 random items

Enemy-cards.name: Sneaky Stabber
Enemy-cards.description: Forces player to drop 1d4 items when dealing 3+ damage on a d4.

Enemy-cards.name: B.R.U.C.E
Enemy-cards.description: Roll for room placement. While alive room can't be activated and door is locked. Door can be fixed with HackChip
